{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":2981251,"name":"Carl Guo","username":"carlguo866","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/carlguo866/{size}/164426_2.png","created_at":"2021-12-12T04:46:27.812Z","cooked":"

When one purchases a WCD SS Gearbox, the kit has one of these really nice WCD mounting blocks that go through the stock.

WechatIMG1127962Ã—824 46.5 KB

However, this doesnâ€™t come with the kit for the flipped gearbox and doesnâ€™t seem like there is a way to purchase it separately on West Coast Products.
Screen Shot 2021-12-11 at 11.31.25 PM1104Ã—974 87.1 KB

1678 has a really nice example of using the flipped gearbox and the mounting block in their 2020 CAD.
Flipped Gearbox1726Ã—831 756 KB

Where can I purchase this mounting block separately? or else I can use a normal VersaBlock to mount but I donâ€™t think it gives the same amount of structural integrity because it doesnâ€™t go inside the stock. Any advice?

VEX and WCP both sell it separately.
